section.title: Infos about the e4 tools
section.para: Most e4 tools project contain a README.md file which describes their usage and important classes.

section.title: Adding an editor for a custom model elements
section.para: The org.eclipse.e4.tools.emf.ui plug-in defines the org.eclipse.e4.tools.emf.ui.editors extension point, which allows registering editors for new model elements.
